cooperative_model.label: very_positive_enthusiastic
evidence: I would love to be part of it

bloom_program.label: positive_appreciative
evidence: I couldn't believe how supportive this space is
The commitment, the time from experts
For someone who needs this kind of support, it's really more human capacity building

business_challenges.label: neutral_realistic
evidence: I'm more of the human aspect

explicit_needs.evidence: I'm the least business-oriented person... I'm always left outside of this scene
Being this community, being more sustainable... helping ourselves grow

implied_needs.inference: Describes herself as 'opening like charity' - needs help moving from social mission to sustainable business model
'I'm the least business-oriented person' suggests imposter syndrome or identity misalignment

core_values.evidence: I'm more of the human aspect... who's to say that one shouldn't? Why isn't there a field for that?
Being this community, being more sustainable, helping ourselves grow
I just want people to have access to things... for education and quality

business_vs_social.quote: As lovely as she is, she is a businesswoman... there are some people that are so much with the business side that they don't intend to invest in something like this

interest_level.label: highly_interested
evidence: I would love to be part of it

contributions: Suggested different pools within same pool (thematic grouping)
Raised fairness question about revenue imbalances
Asked clarifying questions about eligibility criteria

concerns_raised.quote: Someone like me I'm on the lower range... someone like Janna that's a whole different level. Isn't there an imbalance?
concerns_raised.bilal_response: Running average mechanism - stabilizes over months

concerns_raised.quote: What is the baseline and what's the criteria?

readiness_assessment.reasoning: High values alignment + high enthusiasm + active co-design participation. Offset by early business stage and unclear revenue. Best suited for pilot as values-aligned community builder, not necessarily high revenue contributor initially.

evidence.text: I would love to be part of it

specific_opportunities.description: Garene suggests Bilal pitch cooperative model to Asfari Foundation (long relationship, 4 ACSI cohorts funded)
specific_opportunities.quote: I think they would love that. It's so different. You should pitch the idea to somebody from Asfari

meta_insights.unique_contribution: Humanizes the cooperative, keeps values at center, challenges purely financial thinking
